name: resistance knowledgebase for campylobacter
description: All acquired resistance genese in the panel for Campylobacter from ResFinder and all mutation resistance from PointFinder

changelog.1.1: Update mutational loci and mutations from PointFinder 2024/03/18
changelog.1.2: Add afflux pump cme and sat4 genes to acquired loci, correct errors in mutation positions porA and rpsL, acquired resistance limited to campylobacter panel
